@@ Malik Saheb , 
This is absolutely true that TPB and other torrent sites have been blocked by INDIAN ISP's after chennai High court decision.
LEKIN, Jo bhi aapka saccha chahne wala hoga wo koi na koi jugaad doond lega aapko comments karne ke liye aur TPB access karne ke liye  , aakhir main bhi to India se hi hoon.Aap apna kaam zaari rakhen Jab kuch din baad log access karenge to hairaan honge aapki nai uploads dekh kar. 

16 tarikh ko jab TPB pure world me down thi tab main sara din access karta raha , kyon ki aapko msg karne ka bahut mann tha.

You dont worry all of our friends will be again united on this platform. kyon ki hum sab ke dil to ekse hi hai.

Thanks
